column5: So armed with the new knowledge from the Ottawa river muskie trip, I took Friday off to fish a Kawartha lake We stopped at the first big weed patch and tried jigging for some walleye, bass were biting but not the walleye then we trolled for walleye along the weed edge then put on big baits for muskie and a small muskie was nice enough to take my offering then we tried a few more spots for walleye with little luck but the bass were there too well back to trolling, the spinnerbait not too far behind the boat just enough that the blades are disturbing the surface, but not breaking the surface... another small muskie bites my hook, dang it looks like the same fish , I wonder if it swam across the lake just to bite my hook a second time.. that was it for muskie, brings my number to five this year...guess I will not reach boating 30 this year like I did last year..LOL back to the first walleye spot and they finally decided to bit too so it was a great day on the water well any day you take off work to go fishing is a great day
Good job man, very nice looking fish.
A day off work to go fishing is priceless.  Nice markings on the fish.

good going on the fish, those ones are usually scrappy little buggers, hopefully I have the same thing to report mid week, heading on a couple day musky mission later this evening.  Thanks for sharing the pics, cool markings on those ones
Nevermind the same fish, I think it's the same picture! They look healthy though eh? Perfect fish. Good call by the way, on the work vs. fishing question.
Gee..Hansome & a Musky Hunter too. You must have to fight the women off with a stick!
Atta boy Terry! Looks like a great day on the water, what did you get for walleye?
Nice looking fish Terry! They almost look anodized!

walleye nothing big, but they were over the slot size.........  I was hoping to really get into the walleye but a few are better then nothing water surface temp was 65 and I do have trouble finding them as the temps drop this time of year
Great looking ski's,beautiful color  Thanx for sharing  cheers Streamerguy
very nice clean looking fish! Good to see the little guys because it means they are reproducing successfully.
Nice fish terry !!!!...cheers
Nice fish Terry, they are cute as a button when they are that size. I just want to pinch their little cheeks.
Main thing is your out there catching, WTG...
Great day on the water for sure Terry. Thanks for sharing. BTW....nice shirt.
well done nice skis
Great report and pics Terry  Looks like you had a great time out there! WTG  Thanks for sharing Leechman
thanks all it was a fun day on the water  now if only I could find the big girls
That's great Terry.  Maybe they're twins  Time to go catch momma!!!  Joey
see mis fish pictures of muskie.....muskie
I need to go out toooooooo.LOL  I know some
Such beauty is hard to come by
